Name: I Haven't Lost Yet!
Title: I Haven't Lost Yet!
Desc: Arataki "He Might Lose but He'll Never Admit Defeatto" is always game for another round!

Talent.Name: I Haven't Lost Yet!
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Only playable if one of your characters is defeated this Round:</color> Create $[K411] Ã—1 and your current active character gains 1 $[K310]. (Only one copy of I Haven't Lost Yet! can be played each round.)

K411.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>
K411.Desc: The {SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element can be considered as any kind of element, and can be used to pay for costs of various kinds.

K310.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>
K310.Desc: Characters must consume {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.\nWhen characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy.
